scripts.dev:tauri: sh -c 'case "${TAURI_ENV_PLATFORM:-desktop}" in ios) bun run dev:ios ;; android) bun run dev:android ;; *) bun run dev:desktop ;; esac'
scripts.build:web: VITE_PLATFORM=web vite build -c vite.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
scripts.build:tauri: sh -c 'case "${TAURI_ENV_PLATFORM:-desktop}" in ios) bun run build:ios ;; android) bun run build:android ;; *) bun run build:desktop ;; esac'
scripts.build:desktop: VITE_PLATFORM=desktop vite build -c vite.desktop.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
scripts.build:ios: VITE_PLATFORM=ios vite build -c vite.ios.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
scripts.build:android: VITE_PLATFORM=android vite build -c vite.android.config.ts && bun run postbuild:semver
